website_summaries.verdict: Reclining chair set with superior padding all around. Matching tempered-glass table is sturdy with plenty of surface area. Ideal for long-term lounging and sunbathing.
pros: Reclining and folding chairs that have wider seat area than other models
Large weight capacity up to 300 pounds
Firm padding supportive with breathable fabric
Matching table is popular because it can be a stand-alone extra surface where needed
cons: Some reports of set being easily scratched and chairs sit slightly lower than they appear in pictures
Shipping issues also present with poor packing choices
